42 #include <moveit_msgs/MoveItErrorCodes.h>

44 namespace moveit_cpp
45 {
46 MOVEIT_CLASS_FORWARD(PlanningComponent); // Defines PlanningComponentPtr, ConstPtr, WeakPtr... etc
47 
48 class PlanningComponent
49 {
50 public:
51  MOVEIT_STRUCT_FORWARD(PlanSolution);
52 
53  class MoveItErrorCode : public moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes
54  {
55  public:
56  MoveItErrorCode()
57  {
58  val = 0;
59  }
60  MoveItErrorCode(int code)
61  {
62  val = code;
63  }
64  MoveItErrorCode(const moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes& code)
65  {
66  val = code.val;
67  }
68  explicit operator bool() const
69  {
70  return val == moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS;
71  }
72  bool operator==(const int code) const
73  {
74  return val == code;
75  }
76  bool operator!=(const int code) const
77  {
78  return val != code;
79  }
80  };
81 
83  struct PlanSolution
84  {
86  moveit_msgs::RobotState start_state;
87 
89  robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryPtr trajectory;
90 
92  MoveItErrorCode error_code;
93 
94  explicit operator bool() const
95  {
96  return bool(error_code);
97  }
98  };
99 
101  struct PlanRequestParameters
102  {
103  std::string planner_id;
104  std::string planning_pipeline;
105  int planning_attempts;
106  double planning_time;
107  double max_velocity_scaling_factor;
108  double max_acceleration_scaling_factor;
109 
110  void load(const ros::NodeHandle& nh)
111  {
112  std::string ns = "plan_request_params/";
113  nh.param(ns + "planner_id", planner_id, std::string(""));
114  nh.param(ns + "planning_pipeline", planning_pipeline, std::string(""));
115  nh.param(ns + "planning_time", planning_time, 1.0);
116  nh.param(ns + "planning_attempts", planning_attempts, 5);
117  nh.param(ns + "max_velocity_scaling_factor", max_velocity_scaling_factor, 1.0);
118  nh.param(ns + "max_acceleration_scaling_factor", max_acceleration_scaling_factor, 1.0);
119  }
120  };
121 
123  PlanningComponent(const std::string& group_name, const ros::NodeHandle& nh);
124  PlanningComponent(const std::string& group_name, const MoveItCppPtr& moveit_cpp);

196  const std::string group_name_;
197  // The robot_model_ member variable of MoveItCpp class will manually free the joint_model_group_ resources
198  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* joint_model_group_;
199 
200  // Planning
201  std::set<std::string> planning_pipeline_names_;
202  // The start state used in the planning motion request

204  std::vector<moveit_msgs::Constraints> current_goal_constraints_;
205  PlanRequestParameters plan_request_parameters_;
206  moveit_msgs::WorkspaceParameters workspace_parameters_;
207  bool workspace_parameters_set_ = false;
208  PlanSolutionPtr last_plan_solution_;
209 
210  // common properties for goals
